features.name: Deflect Missile
features.description: When the drunken master is hit by a ranged weapon attack, the damage is reduced by 25 (1d10 + 20).

features.name: Drunkard's Luck (1/Turn)
features.description:
When the drunken master has disadvantage on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw,
 it can choose either result for that roll.

features.name: Drunken Technique
features.description:
The drunken master does not trigger opportunity attacks when it moves on its turn. Also, when prone,
 the drunken master can spend 5 feet of movement to stand up.

features.name: Ki Fists
features.description: The drunken master's unarmed strikes are magical.

features.name: Legendary Resistances (3/Day)
features.description: When the drunken master fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

features.name: Lucky (3/Day)
features.description: The drunken master can re-roll an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw it makes and use either result.

features.name: Slow Fall
features.description: The drunken master takes no damage as a result of a fall.

features.name: Unarmored Defense
features.description: While the drunken master isn't wearing armor, its armor class includes its Wisdom modifier.

features.name: Redirect Attack (reaction)
features.description:
When a creature misses the drunken master with a melee attack roll,
the drunken master can use its reaction to cause that attack to hit one creature of its choice,
other than the attacker, that it can see within 5 feet of it.

actions.name: Flailing Arms
actions.description: The drunken master makes two unarmed strikes against each creature within 5 feet of its poison.
